column1:
sets  of  grounds  of  appeal.  Counsel 
for  the  Appellant  at  the  stage  of  argument
content the following grounds of appeal.

I. 
Body was  not properly identified according to the law.

II. 
Item used to death was  not identified.

IV. 
Witness  No.2  has  given evidence  before Magistrate Court however he  has  not
called  before High Court to give evidence.

V. 
Evidence given by the Doctor and evidence of 1st  Accused  are contradicted.

VI. 
Learned  Trial Judge has misdirected  herself.
